# Battle of Schärding

|result=Austrian victory
|combatant2=
|combatant1=
|commander2= Ludwig Andreas von Khevenhüller Johann Leopold Bärenklau
|commander1= Maximilian Gaëtan, Count of Toerring Seefeld

}}
The Battle of Schärding on 17 January 1742 took place during the War of the Austrian Succession near present German border. It ended with a victory for Khevenhüller's Austrian forces.
